data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of Richardiidae (Diptera) from Hispaniola

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Perez-Gelabert, Daniel E., Thompson, F. Christian (2006): A new genus and species of Richardiidae (Diptera) from Hispaniola. Zootaxa 1259: 25-31, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173157
